env_config.flow_params:
{
    "env": {
        "additional_params": {
            "control_range": [
                500,
                2300
            ],
            "headway_curriculum": false,
            "headway_curriculum_iters": 100,
            "headway_reward_gain": 2.0,
            "lead_obs": true,
            "local_reward": true,
            "look_back_length": 3,
            "max_accel": 2.6,
            "max_decel": 4.5,
            "max_num_agents": 10,
            "min_time_headway": 2.0,
            "mpg_reward": false,
            "mpj_reward": false,
            "penalize_accel": true,
            "penalize_stops": true,
            "reroute_on_exit": true,
            "sort_vehicles": false,
            "speed_curriculum": true,
            "speed_curriculum_iters": 20,
            "speed_reward_gain": 1.0,
            "target_velocity": 6.0
        },
        "clip_actions": true,
        "done_at_exit": true,
        "evaluate": false,
        "horizon": 1000,
        "sims_per_step": 3,
        "warmup_steps": 500
    },
    "env_name": "flow.envs.multiagent.i210.MultiStraightRoad",
    "exp_tag": "multiagent_highway",
    "initial": {
        "additional_params": {},
        "bunching": 0,
        "edges_distribution": "all",
        "lanes_distribution": Infinity,
        "min_gap": 0,
        "perturbation": 0.0,
        "shuffle": false,
        "spacing": "uniform",
        "x0": 0
    },
    "net": {
        "additional_params": {
            "boundary_cell_length": 300,
            "ghost_speed_limit": 6.0,
            "lanes": 1,
            "length": 2500,
            "num_edges": 2,
            "speed_limit": 30,
            "use_ghost_edge": true
        },
        "inflows": {
            "_InFlows__flows": [
                {
                    "begin": 1,
                    "departLane": "free",
                    "departSpeed": 24.1,
                    "edge": "highway_0",
                    "end": 86400,
                    "name": "idm_highway_inflow_0",
                    "vehsPerHour": 1993,
                    "vtype": "human"
                },
                {
                    "begin": 1,
                    "departLane": "free",
                    "departSpeed": 24.1,
                    "edge": "highway_0",
                    "end": 86400,
                    "name": "rl_highway_inflow_1",
                    "vehsPerHour": 221,
                    "vtype": "rl"
                }
            ]
        },
        "osm_path": null,
        "template": null
    },
    "network": "flow.networks.highway.HighwayNetwork",
    "sim": {
        "color_by_speed": false,
        "disable_collisions": false,
        "emission_path": null,
        "force_color_update": false,
        "lateral_resolution": null,
        "no_step_log": true,
        "num_clients": 1,
        "overtake_right": false,
        "port": null,
        "print_warnings": true,
        "pxpm": 2,
        "render": false,
        "restart_instance": true,
        "save_render": false,
        "seed": null,
        "show_radius": false,
        "sight_radius": 25,
        "sim_step": 0.4,
        "teleport_time": -1,
        "use_ballistic": true
    },
    "simulator": "traci",
    "veh": [
        {
            "acceleration_controller": [
                "IDMController",
                {
                    "a": 1.3,
                    "b": 2.0,
                    "noise": 0.3
                }
            ],
            "car_following_params": {
                "controller_params": {
                    "accel": 2.6,
                    "carFollowModel": "IDM",
                    "decel": 4.5,
                    "impatience": 0.5,
                    "maxSpeed": 30,
                    "minGap": 0.5,
                    "sigma": 0.5,
                    "speedDev": 0.1,
                    "speedFactor": 1.0,
                    "tau": 1.0
                },
                "speed_mode": 25
            },
            "initial_speed": 0,
            "lane_change_controller": [
                "SimLaneChangeController",
                {}
            ],
            "lane_change_params": {
                "controller_params": {
                    "laneChangeModel": "SL2015",
                    "lcAccelLat": "1.0",
                    "lcAssertive": "1",
                    "lcCooperative": "1.0",
                    "lcKeepRight": "1.0",
                    "lcLookaheadLeft": "2.0",
                    "lcPushy": "0",
                    "lcPushyGap": "0.6",
                    "lcSpeedGain": "1.0",
                    "lcSpeedGainRight": "1.0",
                    "lcStrategic": "1.0",
                    "lcSublane": "2.0"
                },
                "lane_change_mode": 512
            },
            "num_vehicles": 0,
            "routing_controller": null,
            "veh_id": "human"
        },
        {
            "acceleration_controller": [
                "RLController",
                {}
            ],
            "car_following_params": {
                "controller_params": {
                    "accel": 2.6,
                    "carFollowModel": "IDM",
                    "decel": 4.5,
                    "impatience": 0.5,
                    "maxSpeed": 30,
                    "minGap": 2.5,
                    "sigma": 0.5,
                    "speedDev": 0.1,
                    "speedFactor": 1.0,
                    "tau": 1.0
                },
                "speed_mode": 25
            },
            "initial_speed": 0,
            "lane_change_controller": [
                "SimLaneChangeController",
                {}
            ],
            "lane_change_params": {
                "controller_params": {
                    "laneChangeModel": "LC2013",
                    "lcCooperative": "1.0",
                    "lcKeepRight": "1.0",
                    "lcSpeedGain": "1.0",
                    "lcStrategic": "1.0"
                },
                "lane_change_mode": 512
            },
            "num_vehicles": 0,
            "routing_controller": null,
            "veh_id": "rl"
        }
    ]
}
